price: 80. He said: "Would that I had strength (men) to overpower you, or that I could betake myself to some powerful support (to resist you)."
arabic: قَالَ لَوۡ أَنَّ لِي بِكُمۡ قُوَّةً أَوۡ ءَاوِيٓ إِلَىٰ رُكۡنٖ شَدِيدٖ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: qāla law anna lī bikum quwwatan aw āwī ilā ruk'nin shadīdin
